object.name: setStickerMaskPosition
object.description: Use this method to change the mask position of a mask sticker. The sticker must belong to a sticker set that was created by the bot. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to change the mask position of a mask sticker. The sticker must belong to a sticker set that was created by the bot. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to change the `mask position <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#maskposition>`_ of a mask sticker. The sticker must belong to a sticker set that was created by the bot. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized object with the position where the mask should be placed on faces. Omit the parameter to remove the mask position.
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized object with the position where the mask should be placed on faces. Omit the parameter to remove the mask position.
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized object with the position where the mask should be placed on faces. Omit the parameter to remove the mask position.
annotations.name: mask_position
